price: Esses serão recompensados com a câmara etérea, porque pacientaram; e, nele, ser-lhe-ão conferidas saudações e paz.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yuj'zawna al-ghur'fata bimā ṣabarū wayulaqqawna fīhā taḥiyyatan wasalāman
